statements: DELETE FROM employee_engagement WHERE initiative_name = 'Project X';

DELETE FROM employee_engagement WHERE engagement_level < 2 AND initiative_name = 'Team Building'

DELETE FROM Department WHERE manager_id IN (SELECT id FROM Manager WHERE department_id = 201);
